channel.title: Um i'm new can someone help me with this?
channel.description:
Um yeah i'm new here and i'd like some help with moparscape ive tried some stuff but can't get it to work here is my list of questions please help me any real help would be appreciated:
1. How do i open .cfg files? im running on windows XP and when i click them it says it cannot open them
2. Why does all my stuff vanish when i try to sign in again on my own "start server"
3. How can i connect and go to other servers?
Once again any help would be appreciated thank you in advance as i may not be able to stay around much more i'll check this topic again as soon as i can

item.title: Um i'm new can someone help me with this?
item.dc:creator: @zezuma zezuma
item.description:
@zezuma wrote:

[quote=“Bass626, post:1, topic:44585”]Um yeah i’m new here and i’d like some help with moparscape ive tried some stuff but can’t get it to work here is my list of questions please help me any real help would be appreciated:

  1. How do i open .cfg files? im running on windows XP and when i click them it says it cannot open them

  2. Why does all my stuff vanish when i try to sign in again on my own “start server”

  3. How can i connect and go to other servers?

Once again any help would be appreciated thank you in advance as i may not be able to stay around much more i’ll check this topic again as soon as i can[/quote]

  1. you double click and it should say find the program on a list. do that then click notepad then you can edit it

  2. don’t use hybridscape its pointless

  3. you enter the ip and log in

Read full topic
item.source: Um i'm new can someone help me with this?

item.title: Um i'm new can someone help me with this?
item.dc:creator: @malganis malganis
item.description:
@malganis wrote:

I also have that problem with the .cfg files soi dont know about that.

You kinda restart the sever when you re-open the program…

You use the IP address (by your user and pass) of the sever you’re trying to get in.
You’re welcome.

Read full topic
